projects.title: ECommerce Pro
projects.description: A full-featured eCommerce platform with admin dashboard, payment integration, and inventory management.
projects.longDescription: Complete eCommerce solution built with Next.js and Node.js featuring user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, payment processing with Stripe, order management, and comprehensive admin panel. Includes features like wishlist, reviews, search filters, and mobile-responsive design.

projects.title: EduLearn Platform
projects.description: Learning management system for online education with course management and student tracking.
projects.longDescription: Comprehensive LMS platform enabling educators to create and manage courses, track student progress, conduct assessments, and facilitate online learning. Features include video streaming, interactive quizzes, discussion forums, and detailed analytics dashboard.

projects.title: B2B CRM Dashboard
projects.description: Customer relationship management system for B2B companies with lead tracking and analytics.
projects.longDescription: Advanced CRM system designed for B2B operations featuring lead management, customer tracking, sales pipeline, automated workflows, reporting dashboard, and team collaboration tools. Includes integration with email marketing and third-party APIs.

projects.title: Food Delivery App
projects.description: B2C food delivery platform with real-time tracking and payment integration.
projects.longDescription: Modern food delivery application connecting customers with restaurants. Features include restaurant listings, menu browsing, cart management, real-time order tracking, payment processing, rating system, and delivery management for restaurant partners.

projects.title: Portfolio Website Builder
projects.description: SaaS platform for creating professional portfolio websites with drag-and-drop interface.
projects.longDescription: No-code portfolio builder allowing users to create stunning portfolio websites using drag-and-drop interface. Includes multiple templates, custom domain support, SEO optimization, analytics integration, and responsive design across all devices.

projects.title: Inventory Management System
projects.description: B2B inventory tracking system with barcode scanning and automated alerts.
projects.longDescription: Comprehensive inventory management solution for businesses featuring product tracking, barcode scanning, automated reorder alerts, supplier management, reporting dashboard, and multi-location support with real-time synchronization.

projects.title: Online Quiz Platform
projects.description: Educational quiz platform with real-time results and performance analytics.
projects.longDescription: Interactive quiz platform for educational institutions featuring timed quizzes, multiple question types, real-time leaderboards, detailed performance analytics, certificate generation, and comprehensive admin panel for quiz management.

projects.title: Real Estate Portal
projects.description: Property listing platform with advanced search filters and virtual tours.
projects.longDescription: Modern real estate platform connecting buyers, sellers, and agents. Features property listings with high-quality images, virtual tour integration, advanced search and filter options, mortgage calculator, agent profiles, and lead management system.
